title: Yellow gloves

description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created  in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000892; Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
